docs.snippet: MEXICO CITY, April 16-- President Gustavo Diaz Ordaz warned last night that Latin America's projected economic integration must primarily benefit Latin companies rather than those of the United States.
docs.lead_paragraph: MEXICO CITY, April 16-- President Gustavo Diaz Ordaz warned last night that Latin America's projected economic integration must primarily benefit Latin companies rather than those of the United States.
docs.abstract: Diaz warns projected econ integration must benefit Latin-Amer cos, not US cos, TV-radio rept to Mex; stresses Latin-Amer desire for econ independence; deplores Arosemena refusal to sign action program; Rusk holds prospect of econ integration will spur indus growth, US TV int; Sen Mansfield lauds Johnson role at conf, sees Cong support for program, int

headline.main: DIAZ IN A WARNING ON LATIN PARLEY; Mexican Leader Says He Is Not Satisfied With Results

byline.original: By HENRY GINIGER Special to The New York Times

docs.snippet: STONEWALL, Tex., April 16 (AP)--President Johnson drove his family to a little country church here today as he relaxed and worked over the weekend.  Mr. Johnson and his wife, their daughter Luci and son-inlaw, Patrick J. Nugent, attended the St....
docs.lead_paragraph: STONEWALL, Tex., April 16 (AP)--President Johnson drove his family to a little country church here today as he relaxed and worked over the weekend. Mr. Johnson and his wife, their daughter Luci and son-inlaw, Patrick J. Nugent, attended the St. Francis Xavier Catholic Church, which is about two miles from the President's ranch house.
docs.abstract: historical marker dedicated where 4-yr-old Johnson mailed his 1st lr, 1912, Hye PO, Tex

headline.main: President Is Facing Changing Problems on Return to the Capital

byline.original: By MAX FRANKEL Special to The New York Times

docs.snippet: HAVANA, April 19 (AP)-- Premier Fidel Castro denounced tonight the recent conference of Western Hemisphere chiefs of state as "a tremendous failure." He called for immediate revolution all across Latin America.
docs.lead_paragraph: HAVANA, April 19 (AP)-- Premier Fidel Castro denounced tonight the recent conference of Western Hemisphere chiefs of state as "a tremendous failure." He called for immediate revolution all across Latin America.
docs.abstract: Castro calls for immediate revolution in Latin Amer, s, Havana, marking 6th anniv of Bay of Pigs invasion; ref to Guevara evokes standing ovation

docs.snippet: BONN, April 19--Konrad Adenauer, "der Alte," who led a disgraced West Germany to unparalleled material prosperity and a place of respect, died today. He was 91 years old.  WASHINGTON, April 19-- President Johnson will attend the funeral of former...
docs.lead_paragraph: BONN, April 19--Konrad Adenauer, "der Alte," who led a disgraced West Germany to unparalleled material prosperity and a place of respect, died today. He was 91 years old. WASHINGTON, April 19-- President Johnson will attend the funeral of former Chancellor Konrad Adenauer Tuesday in West Germany, the White House announced today.

headline.main: Adenauer, Rebuilder of West Germany, Dies; Former Chancellor, 91, Guided Nation to Prosperity

byline.original: By PHILIP SHABECOFF Special to The New York Times

docs.snippet: JERUSALEM (Israel) April 20--Nearly 17,000 sun-bronzed marchers from Israel and abroad strode into Jerusalem today to end the 13th annual four-day holiday march.
docs.lead_paragraph: JERUSALEM (Israel) April 20--Nearly 17,000 sun-bronzed marchers from Israel and abroad strode into Jerusalem today to end the 13th annual four-day holiday march.

headline.main: 17,000 Stride Into Jerusalem After a 4-Day Passover March

byline.original: By JAMES FERON Special to The New York Times

docs.snippet: BOGOTA, Colombia, April 20 --A policy of gradualism was prescribed last night by President Carlos Lleras Restrepo to meet Latin America's economic and social problems.
docs.lead_paragraph: BOGOTA, Colombia, April 20 --A policy of gradualism was prescribed last night by President Carlos Lleras Restrepo to meet Latin America's economic and social problems.
